title: Probate - Everyone has made their legal declarations
paragraph1: All executors applying for probate have made their legal declarations.
paragraph2: The person responsible for making this application will receive the grant of probate within 20 working days of the probate registry receiving all the necessary paperwork.
paragraph3: Contact the executor who’s responsible for this application if you need more information.
paragraph4: You’ll need to sign a photocopy of the will if you haven’t already.
paragraph4-codicils: You’ll need to sign a photocopy of the will and any codicils if you haven’t already.
paragraph5b: your feedback will help us to improve it.
